title: Ground Control
subtitle: We are collaborating with Open Source Ecology to develop a control system for their upcoming open source skid steer platform to support low-cost infrastructure development

title: Mobile Laboratories
subtitle: In partnership with our community, we are developing and helping manage a fleet of mobile laboratories to support on-site agronomy, disaster relief, and community outreach

title: Open Microscopy
subtitle: We are working to develop an open microscopy dataset and algorithms for the OpenFlexure microscope to support diy agricultural and health modeling in resource-constrained environments

title: LoRaWAN Collaborative Review
subtitle: We are writing a collaborative literature review on Long Range Wireless Area Network (LoRaWAN) technology for agricultural monitoring and operator decision support
